alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 5:55PM CDT until September 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sherman, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Gunter, Tom Bean, Knollwood, Dorchester, Eisenhower State Park, Southmayd, Tioga, Ethel, Boddie, Ida, Luella, White Mound, and Lake Ray Roberts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
